パッケージ info.ahaha.guiapi.test

  • クラスのサマリー 
    クラス 説明
    test
    public test(int slot) {
    super(IconFactory.Make(Material.WATCH, "Watch", ChatColor.RED + "color ok"), slot);

    addAccepter(ClickType.SHIFT_LEFT, (AccepterAttributes.AcceptersConnecter) () -> {
    AtomicReference item = new AtomicReference<>(); // 安全性を確保

    return Arrays.asList(
    (AccepterAttributes.augPlayer) (player) -> {
    player.sendMessage("shift + left");
    item.set(player.getItemInHand());
    },
    (AccepterAttributes.changeItem) (e) -> item.get()
    );
    });

    addAccepter(ClickType.LEFT, (AccepterAttributes.noAug) () -> getServer().broadcastMessage("right"));
    addAccepter(ClickType.SHIFT_RIGHT, (AccepterAttributes.changeGUI) () -> getGUI("test2"));
    addAccepter(InventoryAction.PICKUP_HALF, (AccepterAttributes.noAug) () -> getServer().broadcastMessage("all"));

    setDefault((AccepterAttributes.noAug) () -> getServer().broadcastMessage("default"));
    }
    test2_1_drag_AllMove_GUI
